announcement: The site will be transferring on 01/04/2024. Read about it here!
sketch: Hey look! It's Flash 2, I animated in this!
qow: In total life- *cough* In toe- In toutrl life danger *laughing* life *laughing again* In toutrl life dange. (full toon coming soon!)

nc.d: The true end, an anti-climatic one but still. Don't tell the Youtube folk the truth. ;)
Finally, the half of an album is released to the world!
The final main page, and Housemoon falls to the might of the British Military. Great ending.
Woah a game AND a cartoon! Holy weenis! Have the stars aligned?
In the world of WarioWare: I'M A TUMOUR, I'M A TUMOUR! OH. I'M A TUMOUR!
In the world of WarioWare: Housemoon meets Penny. GOD HELP US.
In the world of WarioWare: Housemoon is missing! More next issue!
In the world of WarioWare: Naked Mona and 4th wall breaks. GREAT.
In the world of WarioWare: Housey & Weaky see the button. OH NO.
Housecleaning gets its due with its own main page!
Instead of getting a cool toon for the 5th anniversary, you get a TEASER for a toon! HOW OrIgInAl!!
For the Christmas season, the Housemoon Sprinter gang wanted to do something. This is certainly something.
Housemoon and Weak Good duet on a classic Irish Christmas song, what jolly fun!
Coinciding with Flash 2, here comes another meta-commentary!
A craptoon by it's finest definition. At least it's got some easter eggs...
In the world of WarioWare: Warioworld doesn't have bleach. Huh.
In the world of WarioWare: Prev mode activated, isn't Mona 15?
In the world of WarioWare: Weak Happy becomes Mona. OOooooh Yeah.
I was going to make some for the past 2 years but I never had the motivation till now.
Made this for a friend, he was learning Flash, you should too!
In the world of WarioWare: Housemoon breaks the forth wall!
The gang star in a recreation of The Venture Bros intro! Happy 18th Birthday!
Housemoon supplements Weak Good's lack of emailage, by telling the story of his first email.
Housemoon accidentally spills Weak Good's urn, so Housemoon frantically cleans up his mistake!
Take a sneek peek at what goes on in the Housemoon Sprinter Studios, it ain't pretty.
Housemoon doesn't care much for the Jubilee, so the gang go to London to make him like it.
Housemoon gets kidnapped in some weird iOS app from the late 2000's.
Housemoon's gained some weight, and with it some internet fame.
Weak Good gets a chance to create a mainpage, a chance he shall never recieve again. EVER.
Housemoon wakes up and hosts his usual New Years Special, but the gang have had enough...
Weak Git gets drunk, and M.C. Happy tries to get Adojo boned in this family friendly experience!
The meeples return from their two year hiatus, and star in a mainpage! Still not on CBBC!
Poor Housemoon gets a valve smashed into his head, makes a good mind opener though.
Housemoon tries to find Weak Good but goes five versions too far back.
Weak Good and Weak Happy return to play Spore, a masterpiece I'll tell you that.
Mesa thinks you web rowser is broke to oblivion.

nc.n: Corona I: The Beginning of the End
nc.d: The gang return after a two month hiatus to reak havoc, but they instead get an unexpected suprise...
Welcome to Houseflix, 'The newest wave in streaming technology!'
Weak Good gets mad at those blommin' Rugby shouters, Tubs and Coach D...
A retelling of the book that started it all, with some twists in there.
Only a couple of days late, and not 2 months this time.
In the fifth email extravaganza, Weak Good gets a new computer, Housemoon breaks the old one.
The Meatles dig up an old vinyl from their attic, and release it to the world.
Weak Good comments on how great the 2010s were, or weren't...
Weak Good trys to review his own DVD boxset, but Housemoon rudely interrupts.

nc.n: Xmas Short: Blowing the Lights Out
nc.d: Housemoon decides because his Christmas Lights broken: he'll blow it the crap up! PERFECT LOGIC.
The Meatles release an album for the Christmas season, let's just agree it didn't sell well.
Housemoon and Weak Good go up against COPPA, the way they usually do!
Housemoon comes to terms with the fact that Brexit had to happen...
Housemoon seems quite alone, on his favourite holiday... Weird.
The Meatles debut thier new album, their 3 part, half an hour LONG debut album, but still an album.
Housemoon and Weak Good engage in an advert about Macs.
Weak Good and Housemoon demostrate their weird realtives, Here comes Springboy and Benor!
Housemoon and friends advertise their first DVD!
Weak Good finally goes outside, it ain't the best experience...
Housemoon reviews the exprimental film, Empire by good old Andy Warhol!
Hello? Is there anything there?
Bringing back Housemoon for this one time show!
Hey how'd it get dark so quickly?
Weak Good gets asked what his favorite food is...
Housemoon Sprinter announces the fake shutdown of his site...
Happy Mothers Day! Oh, and NEVER EVER borrow money from Housemoon Sprinter...
Celebrating that day only one country cares about for anything but beer: Saint Patrick's Day!
Pi or Pie? I don't know! Anyway... Housemoon creates an awful pun for this mathmetical day...
Housemoon gets depressed with a DS Lite? What a total wuss.
What a... Badly hidden secret...
Can Housemoon have a good bonfire? Tune in to find out!
Housemoon became a zombie! Oh no!
Housemoon is stuck in a loading screen... Twice...
Housemoon throws a Halloween Party for his friends!
What is this toon about? Wait to find out!
American Online, It's poop, It's crap, It's utter garbage!
Sugar, Sugar! You are my candy girl, & you got me wanting you!
Housemoon returns to Mario Paint by eating marshmallows!
Housemoon gets punched in the face, then he 'byes'?
Today on CBBC, Housemoon Meeples with Jake Paul playing Weak Happy! (Not really.)
Housemoon explains why the site's under maintenance. Poorly...
This was gonna be an intro for the site, never in a million years!

bt.d: Housemoon accidentally spills Weak Good's urn, so Housemoon frantically cleans up his mistake!
Housemoon wakes up and hosts his usual New Years Special, but the gang have had enough...

bt.n: Corona I: The Beginning of the End
bt.d: The gang return after a two month hiatus to reak havoc, but they instead get an unexpected suprise...
A retelling of the book that started it all, with some twists in there.
Wow! A new cartoon! What fun!
Weak Good just wants to read the news, but Housemoon won't let him be!
Housemoon used to love his marshmallows didn't he?

bt.n: The Fastest Sprinter in the World Contest
bt.d: The original book that started it for this Homestar ripoff.

ft.d: Comics all bulit with WarioWare D.I.Y! In sweet sweet Macintosh monochrome!
Weak Good and Weak Happy play viddy gams. HoW oRiGiNal!!
Housemoon sits in his fancy desk as he reviews random crap.
Weak Good answers his own emails, and at a way faster pace than ol' Housey over there.
Housemoon answers email! Rarely, but this still exists so it's here.

rt.n: Corona I: The Beginning of the End
Xmas Short: Blowing the Lights Out
The Fastest Sprinter in the World Contest

bb.d: Weak Happy can't survive without the tinternet, so the lads teach how to... do that. And socialising for the crack.
Weak Good and Housemoon discover thier demented candy bar recipe from thier college days, so they make it. It ain't pretty.
Housemoon and Weak Good smash the forth wall open like an egg, on this edition of WGEmail!
Coach D's beef jerky suddenly goes missing, therefore he goes on a murderous rampage to find out how did it. Take a while stab in the dark who did...
Weak Good and Abode think it's a good idea to try to get Housemoon into Yu-Gi-Oh! Fair idea, I guess.
Housemoon and Weak Good return to diss Apple and Microsoft yet again, by doing literally nothing I just said!
Housemoon's computer is sentient and has a name! But is it really sentient?
Housemoon answers a concerning email about him having AIDs. Tubs is also a doctor?

Housemoon and Weak Good suddenly realise they have no 5 year anniversary ideas, or ideas in general, and that they are late for their own anniversary, queue the meta commentary and parodies of Youtubers!
